title: panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
body:
System information
Mainnet  crash
Geth version: geth version
OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
Commit hash : (if develop)
Geth/Geth LIGHTCLIENT MAINNET Network/v1.8.0-unstable-0544a43c/linux-amd64/go1.9.4

Expected behaviour
No crash

Actual behaviour
crash

Backtrace
